trans-unit.source: Provides common methods and properties for composite activity designers that contain structured layouts.
trans-unit.target: Fornece métodos e propriedades comuns para designers de atividade composta que contêm layouts estruturados.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner is the base class for all designers that contain child designers and the child designers are connected to each other using lines rendered on the design surface, called connectors.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner é a classe base para todos os designers que contêm os designers do filho e os designers de filho são conectados entre si usando linhas renderizadas na superfície de design, chamado de conectores.

trans-unit.source: The class is provided so that activity designer developers can provide a number of activity designer layout types, rather than being tied to the layout provided in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: A classe é fornecida para que os desenvolvedores de designer de atividade podem fornecer um número de tipos de layout do designer de atividade, em vez de que está sendo vinculada ao layout fornecido a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that contains information about the current designer view displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o modo de exibição de designer atual exibido pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ActiveView contains the view ID and any text, images, activity designers, and user data associated with the view.
trans-unit.target: ActiveView contém a ID de exibição e qualquer texto, imagens, designers de atividade e dados de usuário associados à exibição.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that contains information about the current view displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o modo de exibição atual exibido pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se as atividades especificadas podem ser adicionadas para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> no local especificado na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains the screen location at which to attempt to insert the activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que contém o local da tela em que a tentativa de inserir as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> coleção somente leitura que contém as atividades para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified activities can be inserted at the specified location on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as atividades especificadas podem ser inseridas no local especificado na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be removed from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se as atividades especificadas podem ser removidas do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> coleção somente leitura que contém as atividades para remover.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified activities can be removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as atividades especificadas podem ser removidas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic read-only collection that contains all activity designers that are children of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção genérica de somente leitura que contém todos os designers de atividade que são filhos do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> read-only collection that contains the child designers.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> coleção somente leitura que contém os designers de filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current drop target in the array of drop targets returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice de destino de soltar o atual na matriz de destinos de soltar retornado por <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets*>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the index of the current drop target for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro que representa o índice do destino de soltar atual para o designer.

trans-unit.source: Draws all of the connectors to display on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desenha todos os conectores para exibir o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Conectores estão os links entre os designers separadas em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on the designers it connects.
trans-unit.target: Esses links aparecem como linhas na superfície de design e final de cada linha se conecta a um ponto visível sobre os designers de se conectar.

trans-unit.source: These points are called connection points.
trans-unit.target: Esses pontos são chamados de pontos de conexão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the connectors.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> na qual desenhar os conectores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> to draw the connectors.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref> para desenhar os conectores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> array that contains the endpoints for each of the connectors to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> matriz que contém os pontos de extremidade para cada um dos conectores para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> that determines the graphic to draw at connector start points.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"> </xref> que determina o gráfico para desenhar pontos de início do conector.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> that determines the graphic to draw at connector end points.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"> </xref> que determina o gráfico para desenhar pontos de extremidade do conector.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified activity designer is visible on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o designer de atividade especificada está visível na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> for which to ensure visibility on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> para os quais garantir a visibilidade na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: FirstSelectableObject returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A> property that is exposed through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: FirstSelectableObject retorna <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>associado à <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A>propriedade que é exposta por meio de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que é o primeiro objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of valid drop locations on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> surface.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma matriz de locais de destino válido no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> superfície.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to query the design surface with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> para consultar a superfície de design com.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> matriz que representa os locais de destino válido no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> superfície.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of points that represent the inner connection points for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção somente leitura de pontos que representam os pontos de conexão interna para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Conectores estão os links entre os designers separadas em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on each designer it connects.
trans-unit.target: Esses links aparecem como linhas na superfície de design e final de cada linha se conecta a um ponto visível em cada designer se conecta.

trans-unit.source: These points are called connection points.
trans-unit.target: Esses pontos são chamados de pontos de conexão.

trans-unit.source: Designer classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> class can contain other designers, and GetInnerConnections returns a read-only collection of all the connection points for the designers associated with `edges` that are contained by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Designers classes que herdam o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>classe pode conter outros designers e GetInnerConnections retorna uma coleção somente leitura de todos os pontos de conexão para os designers associados `edges` contidos <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The DesignerEdges along which to search for connection points.
trans-unit.target: DesignerEdges ao longo do qual pesquisar os pontos de conexão.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> generic read-only collection that contains the inner connection points for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> coleção genérica de somente leitura que contém os pontos de conexão interna para o designer.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o primeiro objeto selecionável que segue o objeto especificado na ordem de navegação atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual a ordem da navegação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref> que determina a ordem da navegação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro selecionável que segue o obj parâmetro na ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer by using the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer usando a atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: Initialize ensures that the active view loaded into the workflow design surface is a valid view.
trans-unit.target: Inicializar garante que o modo de exibição ativo carregado na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho é um modo de exibição válido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> com a qual inicializar o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified activities to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona as atividades especificadas para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> no local especificado na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que especifica o local para adicionar as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> coleção somente leitura que contém as atividades para adicionar ao <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> is the active activity designer, LastSelectableObject returns `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>é a atividade active retorna do designer, LastSelectableObject `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If a child activity designer is the active designer, it returns the last selectable object associated with the active child designer.
trans-unit.target: Se um designer de atividade filho é designer ativo, ele retorna o último objeto selecionável associado com o designer de filhos ativos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que é o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do designer.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Loads the view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado de exibição da <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> de um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> used to restore the designer view state.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>usados para restaurar o estado de exibição designer.</xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>

trans-unit.source: reader contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: readercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as configurações de tamanho mínimo para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the smallest possible size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o menor tamanho possível para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified activities from one designer displayed in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to another.
trans-unit.target: Move as atividades especificadas de um designer exibido no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> para outro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains the location on the workflow design surface to move the activities.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que contém o local na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho para mover as atividades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection to move.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> coleção somente leitura para mover.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the activity associated with it changes.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o designer quando a atividade associada a ele muda.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the changed activity.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a atividade alterada.

trans-unit.source: e is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: eé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when more than one of the activities it contains has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando mais de uma das atividades que ele contém foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the activities that changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> que contém informações sobre as atividades que foram alteradas.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is completed with the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando uma operação de arrastar e soltar é concluída com os limites de sua superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que define os argumentos de evento da operação.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor enters the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando uma operação arrastar-soltar está em andamento e o cursor do mouse do usuário entra nos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que define os argumentos de evento da operação.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor leaves the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando uma operação arrastar-soltar está em andamento e o cursor do mouse do usuário sai dos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando uma operação arrastar-soltar está em andamento e o cursor do mouse do usuário está dentro dos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que define os argumentos de evento da operação.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de layout para posicionar indicações visuais e designers de filho no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando o tamanho das indicações visuais sobre os designers exibido pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os argumentos de layout.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new size of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa o novo tamanho do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Displays the designer verbs associated with a smart tag at a specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Exibe os verbos do designer associados com uma marca inteligente em um local especificado na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the location on the workflow design surface for which to show <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa o local na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho para o qual mostrar <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when the current designer view changes.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> quando o designer atual exibir as alterações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that is to be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref> que será definido.

trans-unit.source: Stores the current view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Armazena o estado de exibição atual do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> em um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> to which the current designer view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>para que o estado atual do designer de exibição é armazenado.</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> displays smart tags.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> exibe as marcas inteligentes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer displays smart tags; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o designer exibe as marcas inteligentes; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of designer actions that are associated with the smart tags on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção somente leitura de designers ações que estão associados com as marcas inteligentes do Designer.

trans-unit.source: The collection is returned only if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> hosts multiple views.
trans-unit.target: A coleção é retornada somente se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>hospeda vários modos de exibição.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A> property to determine how many views the current designer hosts.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A>propriedade para determinar quantas exibe os hosts de designer atuais.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> read-only collection that contains all the actions associated with the smart tags on the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref> coleção somente leitura que contém todas as ações associadas com as marcas inteligentes do Designer.

trans-unit.source: Get a read-only collection of designer views that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> hosts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção somente leitura de exibições do designer que atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref> hosts.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> read-only collection that contains the views hosted by the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref> coleção somente leitura que contém as exibições hospedadas pelo atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>.
